about_the_game:
You are a professional photographer in a big city, and top models are begging you to work with them. Every minute of your working day is scheduled. You equipped your photo studio with the best possible equipment to make really high quality photos.

With the Street dance DLC you will get hip-hop style dressed photo model Mei and 87 cool street dances for all your models.

Dances:
19 girl style
22 hip hop
21 locking
21 popping
Bang bang
I robot
Make your movie
Skate roll

Do you like watching as someone as dancing? And do you like watching how the pretty girls are dancing? then try out this DLC, switch between the dances and find out which one is the best!

Play the VR and NON-VR variant of the game and find out what else you can do in your new photo studio!

package_groups.name: default

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later (64-BIT Required!!!) It is not working on 32-BIT systems!
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Street dance for photo studio - enjoy the cool street dances acted out by pretty models!
